en: I cry with my voice unto Jehovah; With my voice unto Jehovah do I make supplication.
hmr: Ka râwlin LALPA chu ka ko a, Ka râwlin LALPA kuomah lunginsietna ka hni hlak.

en: I pour out my complaint before him; I show before him my trouble.
hmr: A hmaah ka lunginzîng thu ka hril a, A hmaah ka buoina kân hriettir hlak.

en: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, Thou knewest my path. In the way wherein I walk Have they hidden a snare for me.
hmr: Ka thlarau ka sûnga a châu lai khan, nangma ngeiin ka lampui chu i hriet a; Ka fena lampuia hin ka âwk- na dingin châng an kam inrûk a.

en: Look on my right hand, and see; For there is no man that knoweth me: Refuge hath failed me; No man careth for my soul.
hmr: Ka changtieng hi thlêk la, en ta, tukhawm a mi hre hrim hrim an um ta naw hi; Kân humhimna a um ta nawh a, tukhawmin ka hringna hi an ngaisak ta nawh.

en: I cried unto thee, O Jehovah; I said, Thou art my refuge, My portion in the land of the living.
hmr: Aw LALPA, ka ko cheh a, “Nang chu kân humhimna, Mi hring rama ka chanvo i nih,” ka tih a.

en: Attend unto my cry; For I am brought very low: Deliver me from my persecutors; For they are stronger than I.
hmr: Ka khêk ri hi lo ngai la, nasataka sukhnuoiin ka um ta sih a, A mi suknawmnatuhaia inthawk hin mi sanhim la, keia nêkin an hrât lem sih a.

en: Bring my soul out of prison, That I may give thanks unto thy name: The righteous shall compass me about; For thou wilt deal bountifully with me.
hmr: I hming kân pâk theina dingin ka hringna hi intângna ina inthawkin ṭhuoi suok la, Mi felhai chun mîn huol vêl an ta; Nangin ṭhataka i mi thaw ding a ni leiin.
